TEXT.TITLE: ROBERT HALMI <RHI> GETS FIVE MLN DLR CREDIT LINE
TEXT.BODY: Robert Halmi Inc said it has received a commitment for a five mln dlr revolving credit line from Wells Fargo and Co <WFC>. It said it will use funds for the development and production of television programming. Reuter
